item.title: Running Llama 3.1 on an AMD 6700 XT: My LLM App Journey
item.description: Running Llama 3.1 on an AMD 6700 XT: My LLM App Journey Running large language models (LLMs) is generally smooth sailing if you have an Nvidia GPU or a newer AMD card (7xxx series). Sadly, I wasn’t so fortunate. Here’s my experience trying to get an LLM running on my hardware. Ollama (v0.2.8) Ollama was my first attempt. Since it primarily runs on the CPU and doesn’t support my GPU, it was painfully slow.
